700879f-a.text:
(1)
E. Fordham Road, at the S.W. corner of Southern Boulevard, showing the Embassy Club. It was formerly known as the Parkway Hotel and was erected sonetime between 1893 and 1900. The view is
east.
May 12, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
Another view of the Embassy Club, looking south on Southern
Boulevard.
May 12, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
700879f-a.folder: Fordham Road (East) & Southern Boulevard, Bronx, NY

701850f-a.text:
Southern Boulevard, north from Fordham Road, showing at its juncture with Crotona Avenue, Fordham Hoepital.
May 12, 1938.
